answers.answer: The real reason docs induce is for their time convenience. Rarely does it need to be done. Inductions cause a higher rate in csections. I gave birth with a broken tail bone twice and currently as well as other 3 pregnacies i had bad sciatica. So I feel your pain. I would listen to them. Just wait it out.
Question,  how does it feel to have fractures? I have a lot of pain in my pelvis! I can't close or open my legs too much plus I also get sciatica.

question: Im 37 weeks 3 days along ive never made it passed 38 weeks because they have always induced me this is my third child. This pregnancy i have gestational diabetes, fractures in my pelvc bone and siatic pain like a mofo, ive gained 70 lbs during this pregnancy im usually 109 so its taking quite the toll on me. I moved to washington and the drs (army docs) ar e telling me even with all the stuff thats going.on that they will not.induce me bc they dont do.inductions there unless its emergency. Is there any advice i could get to get them to.induce me.????
title: my baby boy is due may 25 but have a question
